sqlMap.select: select * from(select * from cpu order by cpu_date desc) where rownum<=30 order by cpu_date asc
select * from(select * from cpu order by cpu_date desc) where rownum<=40 order by cpu_date asc
sqlMap.insert: insert into cpu(cpu_pcnt, cpu_user_pcnt, cpu_total_pcnt, cpu_idle,cpu_seq, server_code, cpu_ip) values(#cpu_pcnt#,#cpu_user_pcnt#, #cpu_total_pcnt#, #cpu_idle#, cpu_seq.nextval, #server_code#, #cpu_ip#)
